Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 74th/Green
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Halsted, 76th, and Racine, due to street blockage near 74th/Green.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 74th, Halsted, 76th and Racine, due to street blockage near 74th/Green.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Sheridan/Rogers
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable LS Exp. buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Rogers, Howard Terminal; SB: Howard, Rogers, Sheridan; due to street blockage near Sheridan/Rogers.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Sheridan/Rogers, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Rogers & Howard Terminal.

Southbound buses will operate via Howard, Rogers & Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains running w/residual delays following an earlier minor fire at track level near North/Clybourn. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier minor fire at track level near North/Clybourn.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
